name: Nehan 2: Darkness Fantasy
storyline:
When I woke up, I was sleeping in a bed in an unfamiliar room. The room was dreadfully bleak, with no windows and no view outside.
And there, standing in front of me, was a man in a white coat.
Just as I was standing there in a daze, not understanding what had happened to me, the man in the white coat began to speak to me.
summary: The Sequel to Nahen. Whereas the previous version was a direct panic horror where you escape from the mansion, this one has a psychological sense of fear as the strangeness of the surroundings gradually emerges. Its an RPG Maker 2000 game with cosmic horror and body horror elements.
